meanings.sent1: The territorialists gathered to discuss their support for territorialism.
meanings.sent2: Many territorialists believe in the principles of territorialism.
meanings.sent3: The territorialists jokingly argued over who had the best map skills.
meanings.sent4: She was a true territorialist, claiming every inch of her garden as her own.
meanings.sent5: The territorialists proudly displayed their flags to mark their territories.

meanings.definition: territorialists: those who believe in the importance of territorial boundaries
meanings.sent1: As territorialists, they emphasized the significance of clear territorial boundaries.
meanings.sent2: The territorialists stressed the need to respect territorial boundaries.
meanings.sent3: The territorialists playfully drew imaginary lines in the sand.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a fortress, guarded by the beliefs of a territorialist.
meanings.sent5: The territorialists marked their territories with colorful flags to make them visible.

meanings.definition: territorialists: individuals who prioritize the control and ownership of land
meanings.sent1: The territorialists were determined to control every piece of land they could.
meanings.sent2: Many territorialists compete to own the most land.
meanings.sent3: The territorialists comically argued over who had the biggest backyard.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a kingdom, ruled by the desires of a territorialist.
meanings.sent5: The territorialists fiercely defended their land against any intruders.
